marklogic.body:
**Update From **
Markets are down for a third day since the Tuesday afternoon reversal Commodities leading the tape lower- Oil already at the 50day.
The 8:30 numbers did not help QQQ are approaching its 10day at $67.34 (still best above all moving averages) XLF- is below the 10day of $15.78- next big support is 15.40 area ( they are a bit heavier today) RTH- is on the 10day at $41.76 the 20day is $41.21 $USO – is at the 50day leading us down $39.55
$SPY is now approaching the 20day at $139.03 (if you are still short from Tuesday- nice hold I covered early yesterday) This probably a good Spot to cover. Under the 20day $138.50 is a pretty big Spot— A Spot to examine the leaders and see if we can buy for a tradable Bounce.
